Competitive Programming Solutions

Abc175 Rainy Season

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    int ans = 0, cnt = 0;
    for (auto c : s)
    {
        if (c == 'R')
            ++cnt;
        else
        {
            ans = max(cnt, ans);
            cnt = 0;
        }
    }
    ans = max(cnt, ans);
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc174_E Logs

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using vi = vector<int>;
using predicate = function<bool(int)>;
const int AMAX = 1e9 + 11;
int n, k;
vi a;
bool is_possible(int l)
{
    ll c = 0;
    for (int x : a)
        c += (x - 1) / l;
    return c <= k;
}
ll bsearch(ll l, ll r, predicate p)
{
    while (l < r)
    {
        ll m = l + (r - l) / 2;
        if (p(m))
            r = m;
        else
            l = m + 1;
    }
    return l;
}
int main(void)
{
    cin >> n >> k;
    a.resize(n);
    for (auto &x : a)
        cin >> x;
    cout << bsearch(1, AMAX, is_possible) << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc174_D Alter Altar

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
int solve(int n, string &s)
{
    int l, r, ans = 0;
    l = 0, r = n - 1;
    while (l < r)
    {
        while (l < n and s[l] != 'W')
            ++l;
        while (r >= 0 and s[r] != 'R')
            --r;
        if (l >= r)
            break;
        swap(s[l], s[r]);
        ++ans;
    }
    return ans;
}
int main(void)
{
    int n;
    string s;
    cin >> n;
    cin >> s;
    cout << solve(n, s) << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc174_C Repsept

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
int solve(int k)
{
    ll n = 7;
    for (ll i = 1; i <= k; ++i)
    {
        ll m = n % k;
        if (m == 0)
            return i;
        n = n * 10 + 7;
        n %= k;
    }
    return -1;
}
int main(void)
{
    int k;
    cin >> k;
    cout << solve(k) << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc174_B Distance

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
int main(void)
{
    ll n, x, y, ans = 0;
    double d;
    cin >> n >> d;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
    {
        cin >> x >> y;
        double cur_dist = sqrt(x * x + y * y);
        if (cur_dist <= d)
            ans++;
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

int main(void)
{

    cout << (x >= 30 ? "Yes" : "No") << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc173_C H And V

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
int count_black(
    const vector<string> &color, int mask_h, int mask_w, int h, int w)
{
    int ans = 0;
    for (int r = 0; r < h; ++r)
    {
        for (int c = 0; c < w; ++c)
        {
            if (((mask_h >> r) & 1) or (mask_w >> c) & 1)
                continue;
            if (color[r][c] == '#')
                ans++;
        }
    }
    return ans;
}
int main(void)
{
    int h, w, k, ans = 0;
    vector<string> c;
    cin >> h >> w >> k;
    c.resize(h);
    for_each(c.begin(), c.end(), [](string &row) { cin >> row; });
    for (int mask_h = 0; mask_h < (1 << h); ++mask_h)
    {
        for (int mask_w = 0; mask_w < (1 << w); ++mask_w)
        {
            if (auto cur = count_black(c, mask_h, mask_w, h, w); cur == k)
                ans++;
        }
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc173_B Judge Status Summary

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    int n;
    string stat;
    map<string, int> counter;
    cin >> n;
    while (n--)
    {
        cin >> stat;
        counter[stat]++;
    }
    cout << "AC x " << counter["AC"] << endl;
    cout << "WA x " << counter["WA"] << endl;
    cout << "TLE x " << counter["TLE"] << endl;
    cout << "RE x " << counter["RE"] << endl;
    return 0;
}

using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    cout << (1000 - (n % 1000)) % 1000 << endl;
    return 0;
}

Abc172_D Sum Of Divisors

31 Oct 2020

None

  • Tags: None

using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
int const NMAX = 1e7 + 11;
int f[NMAX];
int main(void)
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    fill(f, f + n + 1, 2);
    f[1] = 1;
    for (ll i = 2; i <= n; ++i)
    {
        for (ll j = i; j * i <= n; ++j)
        {
            if (i == j)
                f[i * j] += 1;
            else
                f[i * j] += 2;
        }
    }
    ll ans = 0;
    for (ll i = 1; i <= n; ++i)
    {
        ans += i * f[i];
    }
    cout << ans;
    return 0;
}
